metadata.title: CVE-2019-15679 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - medium
metadata.description: TightVNC code version 1.3.10 contains heap buffer overflow inInitialiseRFBConnection function, which can potentially result codeexecution. This attack appear to be exploitable via network connectivity.

criterions.comment: x11vnc package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
tightvnc package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
x2vnc package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
ssvnc package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
vncsnapshot package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
veyon package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
